belongs_to_collection.name: New Battles Without Honor and Humanity Collection

original_title: 新仁義なき戦い 組長最後の日
overview: The eighth sequel of the series by the successful “Fukasaku and Bunta” collaboration revolves around the men of a lesser organization that are constantly bullied by the upper organization and “bleed in vain” in gang wars.
title: New Battles Without Honor and Humanity 3: Last Days of the Boss
